channel.title: Community on Open Cluster Management
channel.description: Recent content in Community on Open Cluster Management

item.title: Releases
item.description: Open Cluster Management has approximately a three to four month release cycle. The current release is v0.4.0. Continue reading to view upcoming releases: v0.5.0 on November 2021 v0.4.0 on August 2021

item.title: Roadmap
item.description: The Open Cluster Management community uses GitHub Project to track the progress of the project.

item.title: Resources
item.description: Join conversations with the other people who are involved in the creation, maintenance, and future of open-cluster-management. We want to hear from you. How you are using open-cluster-management? What we can do to make it better? To understand how the Open Cluster Management community is governed, visit the Community repo. Get Connected See the following options to connect with the community: GitHub Mailing group Slack Community meetings YouTube channel
